name: Fly Brew!
description:
Made for the Cozy Fall Jam 2022 hosted by Virtual Turtle Games.

Description

In the coziest coffee shop on Elm St., you play as Phreaidiey (Freddy) The Fly ||, risking it all for your family. You jump into hot coffee cups to save your family. WHAT!? Yes... In your fly community, legend has it that there is an collection of items that make flies immune to their arch enemy — the flyswatter. Now you, Phreaidiey The Fly II, must risk life and limb to embark on a mission to collect all the legendary items and return to your family a hero. The world is waiting....

Mechanics

You will burn up after a certain amount of time which is shown by the bar in the left- get to a safe marshmallow or sugar cube to stay alive. Grab the leaves to gain a permanent a speed up for the level, which will help you progress the game. All leaves must be collected before leaving. Some ingredients you'll have to figure out yourself, but the white milk is always deadly!

Controls

Move - WASD

Pause /Resume - Escape

Talk - Space
